task_desc: Take an important letter to Ay in the land of Lightning.

name: Kakash‘s Face
task_desc: What is hidden behind under Kakashi‘s mask? Treat him to some noodles and find out for yourself!

task_desc: Ninja quest accepted! What? Find the lost kitten! Boring!

task_desc: Chase the betrayed ninjas. This is an easy quest

name: Chase Missing-nins 2
task_desc: Continue to chase.

task_desc: Tsunade has a lot of gambling debts so Akagi has been stealing from you. Want to sort it out? Go to

task_desc: Collect participants’ data for this Chunin Exam. Are there any good new candidates this time?

name: Collect Info for Chunin Exam 2
task_desc: Wow, a mystic participant! Teach him a lesson and get his data.

name: Kill Spies
task_desc: Kill the spy of the enemy land

name: Kill Spies 2
task_desc: The leader of spies is…

name: Find the lost scroll
task_desc: Naruto has stolen the Book of Seal! He went too far! Find him and take the book back!

name: Find the lost scroll 2
task_desc: Mizuki asked Naruto to steal it. Defeat Mizuki!

task_desc: The Konoha Game is about to start! The winner not only gets great rewards but also enjoys a week of

task_desc: The second battle is against Konoha Jonin Legion.

task_desc: The first battle is against Sunaga

name: Fire Chunin Trial 3

task_desc: Explore the Mask Storage Temple of the Uzumaki clan. Find the secret inside.

task_desc: Due to the rebellion in the Land of Moon, there are exiled ninja on the enemy team!

task_desc: Ninjas of Chizuru clan have taken Hinata hostage. Defeat them.

task_desc: The traps of red land have been triggered. Lots of puppets are approaching! Defeat them to complete

task_desc: In the battle, villagers of the waterfall village have been taken hostage. We need to fight to save

task_desc: Clover land of Gold is a unique mining village. Now it is taken by the clan of Black Shovel. Go and

task_desc: Protect Tazuna so he can build the bridge. Should be easy, shouldn‘t it?

task_desc: Powerful enemies are advancing.

name: Guard Bridge 3
task_desc: Defeat the powerful enemies until Tazuna can finish his work.

task_desc: Ninjias of Otogakure are coming. Go and protect Konoha!

task_desc: Gaara turn up in battle out of sudden.

task_desc: Gaara turns into Tailed Beast. He is destroying the village with 1 Trail Shukaku. Go and stop them.

task_desc: The organizer of Akatsuki is in the Land of Rain. Go there and investigate.

task_desc: You have been discovered. Time to fight.

name: Naka Shrine 3
task_desc: The protector of the stone is……

task_desc: I leant a powerful new Ninjutsu! Find Iruka and show it off! (Naruto‘s exclusive quest)

task_desc: Perverted Sage is peaking at women taking bath! Let me teach him a lesson.

name: Road of Hokage 5
task_desc: A fight against Sasuke is unavoidable.

task_desc: Naruto and Lee always keeps hassling me. I want to teach them a lesson. (Sasuke Exclusive Quest)

task_desc: Why has my brother betrayed us? I want an answer.

task_desc: After learning the truth, I decided to stop Unlimited Tsukuyomi since Itachi doesn‘t want that.

name: Fate of the Uchiha Clan 5
task_desc: Finally, a battle with my rival Naruto.

name: My Path 1
task_desc: Came across a horrible person at Chunin Exam. (Hinata exclusive quest)

name: My Path 2
task_desc: Chunin Exam Stage 2. The rival is my brother. I shall fight hard for the one I love.

name: My Path 3
task_desc: A new quest. Time to look for Orochimaru‘s nest. Sasuke is there.

name: My Path 4
task_desc: The final battle against Pain. The time has come!

name: My Path 5
task_desc: Naruto lost his confidence after my brother‘s death. I need to help him.

task_desc: More strange guys in Chunin Exam Stage 1 (Tenten Exclusive Quest)

task_desc: Chunin Exam Stage 2. Temari of Sunaga is a good rival.

name: Find the legendary Ninja tool 3
task_desc: Gaara has been taken by Akatsuki, we need to rescue him.

name: Find the legendary Ninja tool 4
task_desc: Konoha is under attack! If it is destroyed, I won‘t be able to open the Ninja tool store!

name: Find the legendary Ninja tool 5

task_desc: Chunin Exam is about to start. Send greetings to Sasuke and teach him a lesson before Sakura can. (L

task_desc: Chunin Exam Stage 2. My rival is Ino. (Sakura exclusive quest)

task_desc: In the action against Akatsuki, you have come across Sasori,

task_desc: I must take Orochimaru back even by force. (Jiraiya exclusive quest)

task_desc: Pain? What happened to him? Where is Nagato? I have to put an end to this, once and for all.

task_desc: To me, Obito is a true hero, but why, he has become like this?

task_desc: He is alive? I‘ve saw that guy who killed me last time.

task_desc: Was prepared to show them my power, but was exposed by Akamaru. Let’s battle.

task_desc: Just got out of the sticky situation but was attacked by the masked man a 2nd time. I must defeat him now.

task_desc: Final battle, up against archenemy Madara.

name: After the End 2
task_desc: Years later, resurrected by Orochimaru, I once again entered the battlefield.

name: After the End 3
task_desc: Battling Madara again.

name: In the Shadows 1
task_desc: The plan to resurrect Mother is succeeding, but first we must get rid of those who are in the way (Black Zetsu exclusive mission).

name: In the Shadows 3

task_desc: Tried to prevent the coup of the Uchiha clain, but was stopped by Danzo and Uchiha family leader (Shisui’s exclusive mission).

task_desc: Continue to face Danzo’s challenges

task_desc: Fearing that his left eye would fall into Danzo’s hands, he entrusted everything to Itachi.

task_desc: Encountering Sound Four attack during Chuunin Exams. She must battle to protect the students. (Kurenai’ s exclusive mission)

task_desc: Continue battling Sound Four and Orochimaru.

name: Final Battle 3
task_desc: Met kisame and Itachi who have came to attack after Konoha Crush. This is the final battle.
The other 59 experiment subjects have died, Yamato escaped by himself. First, he needs to defeat the guard. (Yamato’s exclusive mission)
After leaving Orochimaru, he joined Anbu Roots, facing Danzo’s test.
Final battle against Kakashi who has killed his own teammate.

name: All for Research 1
task_desc: Decided to desert Konoha in order to research forbidden jutsu, the person trying to persuade him to stay is...

task_desc: Have to join Akatski in order to obtain research materials, but first he must pass Akatsuki’s test.

task_desc: Continue to fend off Team Taka’s attack in order to protect 4th Raikage.

name: Fifth Hokage3

task_desc: Kakashi and Obito are fighting again, let’s stop them. (Nohara Rin’s exclusive mission)

task_desc: Continue to fight Naruto and Killer B.

task_desc: Proceed to save the Kazekage who is caught by Akatsuki. (Chiyo's exclusive mission)

task_desc: Finally managed to get into Akatuski's base, the enemy she has to face is her grandson.

name: Medical-nin 1
task_desc: Attempt to assassinate Danzo with Sasuke during the Five Kage Summit, but was abandoned by Sasuke in the end.

task_desc: In order to meet Sasuke again, she tricked the prison guards with her perfect acting and escaped Konoha prison.

name: Medical-nin 3
task_desc: Encountering Sasuke again, she still chose to help him despite being abandoned by him previously.

name: Ancestor's Will 1
task_desc: In order to awaken Tenseigan and fulfill his ancenstor's will, he has to steal the Hyuga clan's Byakugan.

name: Ancestor's Will 2
task_desc: Please marry me, white eye princess, you are the best candidate for my bride.

name: Ancestor's Will 3
task_desc: I have to fulfill my ancestor's will and destroy this 'failure world' that Sage of Six Paths created.

name: Fourth Raikage 1
task_desc: In his Raiton Chakra mode, Ay has th power to seal Hachibi.

name: Fourth Raikage 2
task_desc: In order to solve the issue of Akatsuki capturing the Tail Beasts, Ay invited the other kages to join the five Kage Summit.

name: Fourth Raikage 3
task_desc: Succesfully defeat Madara's Susanoo along with Tsuchikage in the 4th Ninja War.

name: Fourth Tsuchikage 1
task_desc: Encounter Kabuto and Deidara on the way towards Genbu during the fourth Shinobi World War.

name: Fourth Tsuchikage 2
task_desc: Complete the trials of the previous Tsuchikage.

name: The Last Battle
task_desc: The first battle after becoming Hokage is unexpectedly, his last batte. (Danzo's awakening mission)

name: Liberating Isobu
task_desc: In the mission to liberate Isobu, Guren became friends with Naruto and they face the final enemy together (Guren's awakening mission).

name: Hokage Unite
task_desc: Work with the other 3 Hokage in the 4th Ninja war to defeat the final enemy (Tobirama's awakening mission)!

name: Six Path of Pain
task_desc: Jiraiya ventures into Amegakure alone! He will meet his final enemy there!'

name: Konoha's Collapse
task_desc: Orochimaru launched an attack on Konoha with Sound Four and Sunagakure. Sarutobi has to stop them.

name: Team Taka Activated
task_desc: Team Taka is activated during the Five Kage summit, the target is Raikage! (Suigetsu awakening mission)

name: Final Battle - Obito
task_desc: Facing off Obito in the 4th Ninja War. (Hokage Kakashi awakening mission)

name: Final Battle - Madara
task_desc: Madara arrived shortly after. Battle him with the students of Team 7!

name: Four Kages Join Forces
task_desc: Four Kages who were injured met Team 4 led by Gaara and the final battle begins.（Gengetsu Hozuki，s awakening mission）

name: This is Hardwork!
task_desc: Opening the last gate in eight gates and battling strong enemy 6P Madara (Shimon Gai's awakening mission).

name: Konoha Sannin
task_desc: In the battle at Konohagakure

name: Akatsuki
task_desc: Yahiko

name: Battle of the same clan
task_desc: Face 4th Raikage and Darui in the 4th Ninja Summit War.

name: Battle of Brothers
task_desc: "My foolish brother, you haven't suffered enough!"

name: Team Taka Activated 2
task_desc: Team Taka is dispatched on a mission to find Itachi， Killer B and Danzo. Jugo's awakening mission， team Taka can be dispatched to aid in completing the mission.

name: Legendary Sannin
task_desc: Legendary Sannin's famous battle

name: Kazekage Heritage
task_desc: In the 4th Ninja war， Obito and Sena encounter the ninja team led by the 5th Kazekage.

name: Attacking Konoha
task_desc: Encountered the 3rd Hokage when he went to attack Konoha while they're occupied with the Chunin Exam.

name: Recapturing Sasuke
task_desc: Was sent to Konoha to 'invite' Sasuke back， but was stopped by ninjas from Konoha.

name: Joining Akatsuki
task_desc: After defecting from Konoha， Orochimaru hopes to join Akatsuki， hence he will need to pass the test by Akatsuki.

name: Mysterious masked man
task_desc: Met a mysterious masked man at the critical point of sealing Kyuubi.

name: Joining Forces
task_desc: Naruto and the previous Hokage join forces to battle a formidable foe - Obito who has become Jubi's Jinchuriki.

name: Pain Rikudo
task_desc: In Konohamaru s ultimate battle, he faced Pain Rikudo which is way stronger than him.

name: Past Hokage
task_desc: All former Hokages enter the battle when facing the ultimate enemy - Obito!

name: Stopping Naruto
task_desc: Ordered to go Genbu to stop Naruto who is training， from escaping.

name: Genbu 1
task_desc: Killer B and Naruto head to Turtle Island for training. They must intercept Akatsuki and complete their transformation.

name: Genbu 2
task_desc: Killer B and Naruto head to Turtle Island for training. They must intercept Akatsuki and complete their transformation.

name: Seal of Reconciliation
task_desc: The Shinobi world can only be united if they have a common enemy. And Naruto is the only existing bond for Sasuke. Only by killing Naruto with his own hands can Sasuke achieve this goal.

name: Final Battle
task_desc: In final Battle, Mu will face Ninja Team led by his student Onoki.

name: Reincarnation Trial
task_desc: Conducts combat trials with reincarnations of Asura from past generations!

name: Great Ninja War (Gaara)
task_desc: Gaara leads the ninja forces in a confrontation against Mu, Sena, Gengetsu Hozuki, and the Third Raikage!

name: Great Ninja War (Third Raikage)
task_desc: Engage in battle alongside Mu， Sena and Gengetsu Hozuki against the ninja forces led by Gaara!

name: Reincarnation Trial
task_desc: Battle with the various reincarnations of Indra!

name: Konoha's new Sannin
task_desc: Konoha new Sannin work together against a formidable enemy.
